name: The Decent of Jacobs Ladder
description:
A tale of  two sisters and their cat. Left alone to her own devices the girls set out on an occult adventure through ancient rites and rituals.. The mischief and horrors that ensue are wondrous . Follow the protagonist Kiku, Kiki and their pet cat Kiwi  on their cinematic and detail packed adventure.

-WSAD or Left mouse click to move.

-ENTER to interact

-"X/0" for menu
